tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental X-Ray,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
How grateful I am that I can cite my experience with Dr.Venkat and would like to share my case.



I have a huge problem with my teeth from mychildhood and visited multiple doctors across in two telugu states

My tooth had been hurting and infected for years where i used to manage with temporary solutions and It caused me a lot of other systemic infections

which made my situation more critical and i am loosing the hope day by day. Thought of removing all the teeth as i am not able to bear the pain.

During all these years, I got a couple of replacement bridges after the previous ones were worn out and multiple gum problems



I know Dr.Venkat since early 2014, when i met him at his hospital as a final hope before removing all my teeths.


within a span of few weeks i feel so comfortable and my problem got resolved which i am facing from my childhood


I find that Dr. Venkat takes time to explain all the procedures. he explains all the pros and cons of the treatment so that I can make an independent judgment and he never apply pressure if 

i was not ready for the procedure.


quality work has been done on my teeth.


Doctor Never gave me any false expections , he was very clear with his work and if patient forces to do any treatment which he feels not required, he dont recommed that procedure.(Amazing doctor)


The professionalism and friendliness of the Doctor is outstanding

Till today, I had no hint of any issues with my teeth and visit frequently for every 3 months for general check up



My sincere recommendation and reference to all is to go visit Dr.Venkat my favorite dentist, if have any dental problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have recently done my root canal, wisdom tooth removal and implants here in V DENTIS CARE.
Dr. Venkatesh is very professional, before proceeding with treatment we planned how we will be doing this in step by step manner and in every step sir explained me in detail so that I can make my own decision with cost.
Apart from cost effective treatment suggestions, sir also explained me how the treatment will go, he make sure that steps which are painful will be quick and easy come over.

Root canal treatment - Earlier I had root canal done at other dentist but this was the one of the smooth root canal i have experienced.

Wisdom tooth removal - I have heard that wisdom tooth is hardest to remove and also causes a lot pain in the procedure, but i was wrong. One moment he was talking to me how he will remove the tooth and in a minute it was out I didn't feel a thing. Of course afterwords medicine helps a lot too.

Implants - I had two implants done by Dr. Venkatesh. This was done in within a 45 minutes. This is not about timing but also perfection.

In other words you can trust the consultation, judgment and cost here @ V DENTIS CARE.
reply_text: Thank you somuch Vishal for your valuable feedback , all the best for you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ***** * ****** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ****** ** *** **** very humble and best dentist Dr venkatesh garu. I'm very happy that I have selected vdestis for my smile design treatment.. Absolutely no pain doctor made me so comfortable during treatment and appointments where fixed according to my convenience .. after every sitting he spend some time in discussion and explained everything in details.. Trust me guyz I'm a digital marketer n Im working for wellknow Dental hospital .. While I compare vdentis with them there many things which made me choose v dentis like treatment cost, the way of explaining me about treatment procedure .. I would definitely recommend vdentis n thank you so much sir for making me feel so comfortable while treatment n giving me the best smile 😊

review:
Dr Venkant was very friendly and patient. He did a through examination and explained Me the entire problem with my wisdom tooth and the procedure for removal of the same. He also told me very nicely the After effects and the care one should take post the extraction. He followed  up post the surgery regularly to chk if i was ok and need any further help or advice. 
The best thing i like about him is that he is very calm and composed and not in a hurry what so ever.

review:
I visited vdentis yesterday evening for filling and scaling of my teeth .It was a very smooth and painless process 
and is very much affordable. The doctor is very friendly,soft spoken,good listener and logical. He is more concerned on patients satisfaction which I really liked a lot.The clinic is clean and well maintained. 
I would visit him for my implant too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had very bad pain and my 2 teeth were completely spoiled, because of phobia I never visited any doctor.One of my friend referred to Dr.Venkat, Before even me saying he understood how much I am scared first he made me comfortable and then explained all the process completely, He first prepared me mentally and then once I was comfortable he started treatment. It was very smooth and really appreciate.

I completed two root canal process with very minor pain ( I had very bad experience with previous doctor, that was horrible process) While giving anaesthesia also I never felt much pain.

Thank you so much doctor.

Thanks a lotttttt.
Doctor was very friendly and explained the issue in detail with pros and cons in the future. Had some fillins and scaling as well.
